title: Drew a greatly detailed picture of God Fist Lee Sin, i need 16 Orange Essence for the skin

replies.body: Sadly we can't give out Orange Essence for what would usually be used as RP Art, but if you need a little bit of RP to get something new let me know and I could make that happen!

could you slide me a sicknasty 101 rp under the table for a key? <3 (\/) (;,,;) (\/)

Edit: Ill draw you another picture ;)
That's actually a biiiiit too much for the program (I know I know) We try to keep this under 80 or so, and I'd hate to give some out and you still not be able to buy something =\
thats okay lol figured it was a bit of a stretch (\/) (;,,;) (\/)
